About Us

CRINCE: Wooden Products is one of the traditional family owned business in Sri lanka. It's a wooden ornaments manufacturing business that has been on going over 45+ years. The speciality of these products are that they are 100% hand-made. We use a variety of wood, ranging from Kithul, Mahogani, Awaranuga, Thekka etc. The ornaments display classic, traditional, and iconic sceneries of Sri Lanka, a Country in South Asia. Personalized ornaments are mostly welcomed as well.
